content: **knitted shawl in drops babymerino the piece is worked at an angle with garter stitch and lace pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-088 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height along the middle = approx 47 cm width along the top = approx 150 cm **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 200 g colour 38 olive needles drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 60 - 80 cm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 39 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
